text: Pasión is a 2011 crossover album by the tenor Roberto Alagna of Spanish- language standards.Allmusic reviewGramophone Magazine review 2011 ==Track listing== :1. Piensa En Mi (Agustin Lara) :2. Quizas, Quizas, Quizas :3. Historia De Un Amor, in duo with Lila Downs (written by Carlos Eleta Almarán ) :4. La Cumparsita :5. Dos Cruces (Carmelo Larrea) :6. Cielito Lindo :7. La Llorona :8. Besame Mucho :9. Ella (José Alfredo Jiménez song) (José Alfredo Jiménez) :10. Esperanza (Charles Aznavour song) :11. Paloma Negra (Tomas Mendez) :12. El Día Que Me Quieras (song) (Carlos Gardel) :13. Por Una Cabeza (Carlos Gardel) :14. Siboney :15. Bonus track: "Cu Ti Lu Dissi", modern Sicillian song written by Etta Scollo ==References== Category:2011 albums
title: Pasión (Roberto Alagna album)
